reviewText: A good movie, Kind of slow i was expecting a little more action from a Stallone movie. Its kind of a Stallone chick flick.

As TV stinks, so many of the shows are made for idiots and are just so disgusting, we have had to revert to buying some action DVD's to liven up our week end moving watching.  Even some of the new DVD's are terrible, also, so again we have reverted to some older ones.  P Pratt

I must admit this was a great purchase for me as I hadn't seen 2 of the three movies on this disk...Would recommend it to all of you that enjoy Stallone...
its funny and thrilling at the sam time and the last movies is just a good movie its worth the money buy it now or your missing out
I liked all  of the movies...Stallone is always great...not oscar material..but entertaining none the less I wouldn't pass this up if you are a Stallone fan.

Eye see you is the reason I bought this one, I saw parts of the movie before and it looked good so I bought it, and it didn't disappoint me at all, and it being a triple feature was even better so it was a 3 for 1 deal for me
It was awesome.  Each story was great and different from the other.  Love him as an actor.  Great for my library!!
All three movies are fantastic in their own way!
